question: Is it normal that after 3 years of having my nipple peircings should they now be sore and bleeding. ?
question_content: A couple months ago I decided to change my nipple rings. I knew that the gauges on the new rings were smaller then the old ones I were wearing. I decided to put them on anyway. Now today 3 years later I am in so much pain. After reading some q & a's I now realize that wasnt such a good idea. I'm not sure if the are infected or what exactly is the problem. WHAT SHOULD I DO???? I need help because if they are infected it was said not to take them out but I can't deal with this pain and discomfort for too much longer!!!!!:(

answers.answer_content: Rub purell on it and then since it will be lubed up with purell you can rip them out like pulling off a bandiad
